Nightshift takes to the environment right away and like a true black leopar=
d, he remains very much aloof, and out of view.

" So far it looks kinda qu=
iet.  Noth'n outa the ordinary. "

He stumbles on an animal pelt being cure=
d outside and stops short.

" Note ta one self, don't get caught or else ya=
 end up like that."

He points to the pelt.
